sentences.en: A few days after his collapse he was sitting up in bed.
sentences.cn: 他病倒后没过几天就又能在床上坐起来了。

sentences.en: Collapse the table and put it away, please.
sentences.cn: 请把桌子折叠起来放在一边.

sentences.en: Do they realize we are racing towards complete economic collapse?
sentences.cn: 他们意识到我们的经济马上要彻底崩溃了吗？

sentences.en: He was short of cash after the collapse of his business.
sentences.cn: 在公司倒闭后，他手头缺少现金。

sentences.en: I thought that without me the whole project would collapse.
sentences.cn: 我想没有我的话，整个项目就会失败。

sentences.en: If you work too hard, your health may collapse.
sentences.cn: 如果你工作太累的话, 你可能病倒.

sentences.en: In more than 30 years of surveying he has never yet known a building to collapse because of subsidence.
sentences.cn: 他做房屋评估工作都30多年了，还从未听说过哪一座房子由于地基下陷而倒塌的。

sentences.en: One ant - hole may cause the collapse of a thousand - li dyke.
sentences.cn: 千里长堤,溃于蚁穴.

sentences.en: One ant hole may cause the collapse of a thousand - li dyke.
sentences.cn: 千里之堤,溃于蚁穴.

sentences.en: Talks between management and unions have collapsed.
sentences.cn: 资方与工会的谈判已告破裂。

sentences.en: The collapse of the company will have repercussions for the whole industry.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的垮台将会给整个行业造成间接的负面影响。

sentences.en: The collapse of the Iron Curtain had immediate impact on the lives of everyone in Germany.
sentences.cn: 铁幕的崩溃对每个德国人的生活都产生了直接的影响。

sentences.en: The engineer made a complete diagnosis of the bridge's collapse.
sentences.cn: 工程师对桥的倒塌做一次彻底的调查分析.

sentences.en: The luxury car market has collapsed.
sentences.cn: 豪华汽车市场瘫痪了。

sentences.en: The roof had collapsed long ago.
sentences.cn: 屋顶早就塌了。

sentences.en: The scandal surrounding the collapse of the bank looked set to rumble on for a third year.
sentences.cn: 围绕银行倒闭的丑闻看来会持续到第3个年头。

sentences.en: The storm caused the collapse of the roof.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨使屋顶塌了.

sentences.en: The wall is going to collapse.
sentences.cn: 这堵墙要垮了.

sentences.en: Their dreams went up in smoke after the collapse of their travel agency.
sentences.cn: 他们的旅行社倒闭之后，他们的梦想也随之破灭了。

sentences.en: Uncle Ted’s chair collapsed under his weight.
sentences.cn: 椅子承受不了特德叔叔的重量，塌架了。

phrases.tran_cn: 损毁荷载，极限载荷；破坏负荷；临界纵向荷载

trans.tran_en: a sudden failure in the way something works, so that it cannot continue
if a building, wall etc collapses, it falls down suddenly, usually because it is weak or damaged

trans.tran_cn: 倒坍， 瓦解； 崩溃， 突然失败
trans.tran_en: if a building, wall etc collapses, it falls down suddenly, usually because it is weak or damaged

trans.tran_cn: （突然）倒塌，崩溃，瓦解，晕倒，躺下放松
trans.tran_en: if a building, wall etc collapses, it falls down suddenly, usually because it is weak or damaged
if a system, idea, or organization collapses, it suddenly fails or becomes too weak to continue
